project_descr: Strengthen the capacities of Cypriots to actively participate in a process of reconciliation.

outputs.output_descr: A more pluralistic, vibrant and diverse media landscape created, through civil society participation, in support of the peace process and reconciliation
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

outputs.output_descr: Inter-communal framework for participatory decision-making for spatial planning established
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

outputs.output_descr: Common understanding on the role of youth in peacebuilding created and promoted islandwide.
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

outputs.output_descr: An enabling environment created which allows the promotion of open and diverse public discussion on the solution of the Cyprus Problem
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

outputs.output_descr: Civil society-led mechanisms to support multi-perspectivity in history education created and enhanced to meet the needs of reconciliation
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

outputs.output_descr: Policy mechanisms for economic interdependence between the two communities strengthened
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

outputs.output_descr: Capacity of Civil Society strengthened to provide a vehicle for citizens to play a role in the reconciliation process.
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
